column5: hey everyone got out on the ice today from 10 till 4 only iced 3 fish though still had a great day though my first fish of the year on the ice caught on a little flyer spoon tiped with a minnow head  after that tip up my buddies turn it was a perch maby 10 or 11 inches missed it at the hole then moved to horseshoe bay in search for walleye about a hours or so later i caught another little perch  notice the colour difference between the 2 bays they guy fishing next to us was talking to us and all we hear is drag pulling out of his rod turns out to land this nice pike around 7 pounds had a really fat gut on him  then finally as the sun was going down im jigging bump bump walleye get him up and shes a keeper i got my first walleye before my first pike this year  he has quite the chomp out of its dorsil fin eh looks like this is gonna be a good year have a good one and stay safe out there
Awesome report and pics walleye_man Got to love to Ottawa river for it's diversity in fish species Thanks for sharing and keep up the great work!!! Leechman
Ya nice to see some perch ontop of the ice lol. The only ones i have seen have been on the screen of my underwater camera  Thanks for the report..

iv been watching them on the under water camera as well and iv noticed theve been takeing bigger baits like small spoons other than tiny jigs and if they wont take that just try a small minnow most of the times theyll take that good luck out therer
Nice fish!!!  ... but I gotta say... Dang that looks cold!!!
One of the requirements ..for the '' ICE '' to form....= Cold
He's not that bright.. probably something in the possum.
hahaha yup it is im not complaining

Y'all can have my share of that Bubba Paul!    Shouldn't you be outside taking pics with that new camera son?... or is there just so many pics you can take of snow?  I can explain to you how to post them if you'd like... but who would want to admit that they're dumber than an ol' Possum eatin' Redneck?
